data.eml:eml: Terebellidae (Polychaeta) from the Mexican Caribbean with description of four new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Londoño-Mesa, Mario H., Carrera-Parra, Luis F. (2005): Terebellidae (Polychaeta) from the Mexican Caribbean with description of four new species. Zootaxa 1057: 1-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170120
